good for something.translation[0].defini: able to be used for a particular period of time
Your passport is good for another three years.
good for one month/a year etc
likely to continue living or being useful for a particular time or distance, even though old or not in good condition
This old truck is good for another 100,000 miles.
good for some time/a hundred miles etc
likely to give you something or provide something
Dad should be good for a few bucks.
